page.title: 06Poringland Business
page.content: Poringland has several shops,but Stoke has none.We did a shop survey on peoples shopping habbits at the local stores.Most of the people we spoke to agreed that the shops in Poringland were adequate for their daily needs. Most people bought their clothes and more select items not sold in the local stores,in Norwich.The owner of a shop told us that the shop was started in 1924 by her father-in-law.It has always been a general store but used to be a self service shop as it is today. Surprisingly,a fashionable herb store has also been set up,and is finding considerable local interest. Other businesses include builders, undertakers,electricians,hairdressers, financial services and chimney sweeps.
